title: Is it sunnah to say SubhanAllah ×10 Alhamdulillah ×10...La ilaha...×10? All sunnah dhikr after salah
transcript: is it also a part of Sona to say 10 times subhanallah ten times alhamdulillah 10 times Allah and ten times okay the Sunnah is to say 10 times subhanallah ten times alhamdulillah ten times Allahu Akbar I don't know of ten times these four phrases are to be said a hundred times each and this is known from Hadith um where the Prophet said say a hundred times subhanallah 100 times 100 times and this would be equivalent to offering a hundred camels full of Goods for the sake of Allah a hundred horses it would fill between the heavens and the Earth it would fill the scales on the day of judgment Etc but after this is said openly during the day and night and you can repeat this a hundred a thousand times up to you but to say that after Salat we say subhanallah 33 alhamdulillah 33 and Allah once or we say subhanallahu Akbar 34 or we say subhanallahu Akbar ten or there is another Decker where we say it 25 times but I don't know any of saying ten ten ten ten and Allah Knows Best
